docs.snippet: A panel taking up the case of Gilberto Valle, who was accused of plotting kidnappings when he wrote online about abducting, killing and eating women, said that “fantasizing about committing a crime” was not illegal....
docs.lead_paragraph: A panel taking up the case of Gilberto Valle, who was accused of plotting kidnappings when he wrote online about abducting, killing and eating women, said that “fantasizing about committing a crime” was not illegal.
docs.abstract: Federal appeals court decides not to reinstate conviction of former New York Police Officer Gilberto Valle, who was accused of plotting kidnappings due to messages he wrote online about abducting, killing, torturing and eating women.

headline.main: Ex-Officer’s Conviction in Cannibal Case Shouldn’t Be Reinstated, Appeals Court Rules
headline.print_headline: Court Declines to Reinstate Cannibal Case Conviction

docs.snippet: South Africa’s top appeals court overturned an earlier manslaughter conviction for the Olympic star in the 2013 killing of his girlfriend....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Africa’s top appeals court overturned an earlier manslaughter conviction for the Olympic star in the 2013 killing of his girlfriend.
docs.abstract: South African appeals court overturns manslaughter conviction of Olympic athlete Oscar Pistorious, finding him guilty of 2013 murder of girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp; cites lower court's errors in legal interpretation and handling of evidence in new conviction, which carries minimum prison sentence of 15 years.

headline.main: Oscar Pistorius Guilty in Murder of Reeva Steenkamp, Appeals Court Rules
headline.print_headline: South African Appeals Court Convicts Pistorius of Murder
